title: Disconnecting from Riot Servers
body: I've been having a severe problem with the league servers recently. Every 3 games or so I suffer from lag akin to ping spikes, but my ping stays in relatively normal levels (50-70, fluctuates so I know the screen didn't freeze with ping). Sometimes I lag for 5 seconds, other times I'm simply kicked out of the game. On top of that, I am unable to rejoin the game. Entering the client and interacting with it works fine, but the actual game itself won't load. Does anyone know what to do about this?

replies.body: This may have been due to some disruptions caused by the live maintenance.  Are you still have issues?

I just had an issue 20 minutes ago, while in the Practice Tool.

Tried everything:

- Starting client as administrator
- Compatibility Mode
- Low-spec Mode
- Followed the connection guide but it STILL happens on fiber, dsl and 4G.
- Full repair
- Uninstall / Reinstall

Nothing works.
